name: Protoshift (itch)
description:
Play in a Chromium based browser!

Protoshift is an addicting, fast paced, twitch based, arcade game filled with challenge, inspired by Super Hexagon. Put your mouse hand to the test while attempting to complete impossible levels and compete on global leader-boards. 

Features

Leaderboards (broken)

Steam Achievements

Steam Trading Cards

Multiple Powerups

Masochistic levels of difficulty

A thrilling electronic soundtrack by nubbinownz

And more, such as various challenge modes that may be added in the future.

Soundtrack

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLR_qFtySjuJVgakQnDBLytVb8XhpEprRY

Details

Protoshift was originally released on Steam on Jan 15, 2016. A few years after release I sold the Steam version to a publisher, who's account was taken down some time later.

More info can be found at these links:

  •  https://steamcommunity.com/groups/Protoshift
  • https://steamdb.info/app/398070/
  •  https://web.archive.org/web/*/https://store.steampowered.com/app/398070
